definitions.text: the act of delivering a formal spoken communication to an audience
examples: he listened to an address on minor Roman poets
he recorded the spoken language of the streets
he could hear them uttering merry speeches
they were perfectly comfortable together without speech

definitions.text: your characteristic style or manner of expressing yourself orally
examples: his manner of speaking was quite abrupt
her speech was barren of southernisms
I detected a slight accent in his speech
a good lecture was my father's idea of discipline
the teacher gave him a talking to

definitions.text: words making up the dialogue of a play
the mental faculty or power of vocal communication
examples: language sets homo sapiens apart from all other animals
